scripts.reset-local: pnpm remove-local && pnpm create-local && pnpm deploy-local
scripts.prepare:dev: mustache config/anvil.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:base: mustache config/base.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:base-sepolia: mustache config/base-sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml graph codegen
scripts.build-and-deploy-prodnets: pnpm prepare:base && pnpm build && pnpm deploy:base
scripts.build-and-deploy-testnets: pnpm prepare:base-sepolia && pnpm build && pnpm deploy:base-sepolia
scripts.dev: docker-compose down -v && sleep 5 && rm -rf data && docker-compose up -d && sleep 9 && pnpm codegen && pnpm prepare:dev && pnpm build && pnpm reset-local
